mapper.insert: insert into club_board_reply(reply_no, club_reply_content, club_reply_time, club_board_no, club_reply_writer, club_no) values(#{replyNo}, #{clubReplyContent}, sysdate, #{clubBoardNo}, #{clubReplyWriter}, #{clubNo})
mapper.select: select * from club_board_reply where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo} order by reply_no desc
mapper.update: update club_board_reply set club_reply_content = #{clubReplyContent} where reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: select C.club_board_no, C.club_reply_like, C.club_reply_time, C.club_reply_content, C.club_no, C.reply_no, C.club_reply_writer, C.club_reply_reportcount, M.member_no, M.member_animal, M.member_nick, M.member_interest1, M.member_interest2, M.member_interest3, M.member_gender, M.member_place1, M.member_place2, M.member_place3, M.member_sns_id, M.member_logindate, P.attach_no as 프로필사진번호, B.animal_no as 동물번호, A.attach_no as 동물사진번호, L.club_reply_like_no, L.like_check, L.like_member_no, R.club_report_reporter from club_board_reply C left outer join member M on C.club_reply_writer = M.member_no left outer join member_profile P on C.club_reply_writer = P.member_no left outer join (select * from club_reply_like where like_member_no = #{likeMemberNo} ) L on C.reply_no = L.reply_no left outer join (select * from club_reply_report where club_report_reporter = #{likeMemberNo}) R on C.reply_no = R.club_report_target left outer join mbti_animal B on M.member_mbti = B.mbti left outer join animal_photo A on B.animal_no = A.animal_no left outer join (select * from blocked where blocked_user = #{likeMemberNo})K on C.club_reply_writer = K.blocked_target where club_reply_writer not in (select blocked_target from blocked where blocked_user =#{likeMemberNo}) and club_reply_writer not in (select blocked_user from blocked where blocked_target = #{likeMemberNo}) and C.club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo} order by C.reply_no desc
select R.*, M.* from club_board_reply R left outer join Member M on R.club_reply_writer = M.member_no where reply_no = #{replyNo}
